response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000 by both you and me. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I am proposing to sell it to you for $7,200. This offer represents an excellent value, allowing you to acquire a product that is worth more than what you are paying. I believe this deal would be mutually beneficial, and I look forward to your positive response. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 7200}
